price: 51. Nammay haytô baantá fuxsumtaah, cddc luk usun too waqdi magooqak sinni Rabbi fan sissikuk yawqen.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
